div.p: SHEKEL, the name of a weight and coin current among the ancient Jews. Dr Arbuthnot makes the weight of the shekel equal to 9 pennyweights 2 4 / 7 grains troy weight, and the value equal to 2s. 3 3 / 8 d. sterling. The golden shekel was worth L.1. 16s. 6d.
